title: After 6+ years of playing this game I got perma banned. Riot please give me light.
body:

I never told anyone to kill themselves, or was offensive/racist chat.

replies.body: So you see a pattern in your mild toxicity?

Where? I'm just trying to win ranked. . . =  =

srsly if my chat deserves perma then alot of people would be banned.
"im just trying to shout at my teammates and question their motives, i dont get how that is bad to their mental health and how it is making them play worse not better" common bruh
a lot of people ARE getting banned.  if you are typing more than 2 letters are a time in chat then you are taking a risk

> [{quoted}](name=I AM VBAD,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=J7NOAdWR,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2018-06-03T02:03:22.548+0000)
>
> a lot of people ARE getting banned.  if you are typing more than 2 letters are a time in chat then you are taking a risk

Funny, I chat quite often in my games and use more than two letters yet I have never received so much as a warning for doing so, and I've been playing since S2. Perhaps this means that you don't actually get banned for chatting by itself but rather using chat to abuse, bully and/or harass other players instead.

> I never raged in all chat.

You just raged in team chat. That is not functionally any different.

Bye.
My teammates were all bickering and I get permad? Read my chat, what is the most offensive thing I even said? I'm not even flaming anyone. I've never had a chat restriction.

Impossible to get a direct permaban from this. 

Either you forgot about your punishments, edited something out or you bought the account that was already on a 14-day ban status.

> [{quoted}](name=befatal,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=J7NOAdWR,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-06-02T21:25:55.216+0000)Does this chat seem perma ban worthy? I've seen much much much worse.

The question is whether it is *punishment* worthy, not *perma-ban* worthy. Few behaviors earn an immediate permanent ban, but *all* toxicity *can* earn a permanent ban if you haven't shown proper reform after going through the escalating punishment tiers.

So let's see if it is punishment worthy.

> befatal: ur bad
> befatal: u must b a marshmellow
> befatal: ur soft af
> befatal: this janna
> befatal: threw so hard
> befatal: janna cancer
> befatal: IM TRYING TO WIN
> befatal: AND THIS JANNA THROWING
> befatal: lol stfu toxic
> befatal: u did stupid shit
> befatal: 4 times in a row
> befatal: when ur the one doing stupid shit

The above is all problematic, and I've even given you the benefit of the doubt and removed a lot of unnecessary complaining, belittling, score-shaming, etc.

This is definitely a valid punishment and, if you recently had a 14-day ban, a valid perma-ban.
I suspect OP has been on numerous chat bans and at least one 14 day ban. He's just trying to get sympathy.

Welcome to the club, just don't type in the game, this game is pointless to type in anyways.

Leauge of Legends is the only game I have ever played that they permaban you for being an asshole. Riot is legitemently one of the worst companies I have ever dealt with, and the only reason I dealt with them is because I liked League of Legends. Riot is a piece of shit righteous company. This game has gotten progressively worse, this patch did me in, I am done and leaving for good.

Also, you shouldn't have bothered making a post, people that play this game and Riot basically treat permabanned people as second rate human beings because they all believe it is "righteous and correct" they also being, at least from what I see and have always read, it is "deserved and leave already". Do yourself a favor, this game isn't worth the heart rate increase, it isn't worth the problems it may cause on your own mental health. Make another account if you really want to keep playing, and if you DO do that, I recommend you just permamute chat before that chat gets you permabanned.

>This game has gotten progressively worse, this patch did me in, I am done and leaving for good.

Bye!

> [{quoted}](name=Karunamon,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=J7NOAdWR,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-06-02T23:02:04.389+0000)
>
> Bye!

This guy, these are the type of people that cause problems for others in game. They're passive aggressive and they like to see anguish on others.

This is exactly why my last line existed, I do recommend you permamute chat to save yourself from passive aggressive behavior such as this guy.

Oddly enough, boards and ingame have different rules. 

And if you're going to leave, leave. Stop posting. "I'M QUITTING!!!1" posts are just noise that doesn't tell anyone anything. 

Meanwhile, most of the people who play this game manage to not get banned or restricted, so perhaps the problem is with the handful that do, not Riot.

> Oddly enough, boards and ingame have different rules.

Actually, they don't. They may be enforced differently, but they both covered by the ToU:

ToU for NA:
> This agreement (the “Agreement”) sets forth the terms and conditions by which Riot Games, Inc. and its subsidiaries (“Riot Games”) offer you access to use and enjoy:
> 
> * Our League of Legends computer game (the “Game”);
> * The underlying Game software (the “Software”);
> * #Our League of Legends [website](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/) (the “Website”); and
* > Any other of our apps, websites, games, or services that link to this Agreement, regardless of how you access or use them, including through mobile devices.
>
> While using these products and services (collectively, the “Riot Services”) we may require you to provide personal info. We retain and use such info according to the terms of our Privacy Policy (the “Privacy Policy”).

The emphasized line covers the entire website, including these boards.

Of course most people manage to not get banned or restricted. It would be odd if somehow more people got restricted or banned over not. Some how though I have a feeling more people get restricted/banned than you think. Just like the in game rules and boards have different rules, I can quit the game and still talk on the forums, even if it is just the same old "I quit, here's why." post.

To me the game always outweighed Riot when it came to fun to dealing with a shitty entity. Now it is not the case, I have given my reasons why I do not want to play this anymore, game is not fun and Riot is a horrible company.

I digress, my original point still stands to the op, mute your chat if you have problems with others, it will help you a lot. I'd also like to point out for your restrictions Riot does not really give recommendations on how to deal with your frustrations or anger, or good outlets to deal with it after a hard defeat for you. Riot doesn't care about "dickheads" in this game and has shown they actually do not want to deal with people with mental problems. I am not saying you have mental issues, I am simply stating Riot does not want people with mental issues in their game.
Spam chat. It’s the thing man. The ban system sees spam as toxcity and immediately bans, the fact Riot hasn’t solved this issue, is the key factor why the game is missing many players of skill.
